relatedBlades.title: Interna packages
relatedBlades.copy:
Secure your internal systems with Interna packages. We offer 24/7 support and a 100% uptime guarantee, ensuring your enterprise is always protected and online.

Our Interna plans feature:

- No charges for user bandwidth
- Automatic WAN expansion with every license
- Security for Agentic and Gen AI applications

relatedBlades.title: Modernize your security and network, together

plan.name: Essentials
plan.description: Secure, fast, resilient connectivity with Zero Trust controls across your people, locations, apps, data, and network

plan.name: Advantage
plan.description: Additional protection against phishing and browser-based threats, plus granular network controls

plan.name: Premier
plan.description: Advanced email security and optimized WAN traffic

columnContent.title: Never pay for user bandwidth
columnContent.description: Connect your remote, hybrid, and branch users with a single per-seat price. You'll never see bandwidth charges for devices with our user agent installed.

columnContent.title: Each license expands your WAN
columnContent.description: Replace expensive WAN contracts. Every user license contributes to a shared bandwidth pool that connects your entire network of offices and data centers.

columnContent.title: One global network, one price
columnContent.description: Give every user a fast, low-latency connection. Access our entire global network* for one flat price, with no complex regional surcharges.

columnContent.title: Simplified connectivity costs
columnContent.description: Get unlimited software connectors and private interconnects to your clouds and data centers at no cost — we only charge for seats or bandwidth.

columnContent.title: All-inclusive multimode CASB
columnContent.description: Get unified data protection for all your SaaS applications. Includes unlimited API integrations and full coverage for data at rest and in transit.

columnContent.title: Premium DEM features
columnContent.description: All advanced Digital Experience Monitoring (DEM) capabilities are part of your Interna Essentials package, not extra.

featureLists.description: Take your performance and security even further with Cloudflare's paid add-ons.
